George Sharp tweeted:

>$GVSI update. The company's arrears with the Transfer Agent have now been paid in full as we move forward.

That's certainly good news for $GVSI. But this is something which GS could control the timing of; he could have paid the TA tomorrow or in a week from now ‚Äì there's really no rush. But in a few hours GS has a hearing to convince a judge that $RETC is better off in his hands. Showing that he's responsible with another custodianship will only help his case in today's hearing.

Was the timing intentional? Perhaps we'll never know. But what are the chances that his handling of the $GVSI transfer agent issue will be mentioned in support of his case in the $RETC hearing?

Even B.Riley securities had this to say

Seelos Therapeutics SLS-002 data 'overwhelmingly positive,' says B. Riley B. Riley analyst Mayank Mamtani tells investors in a research note that results from Seelos Therapeutics' Phase II Part 1 open-label cohort evaluating treatment of SLS-002 for Acute Suicidal Ideation and Behavior in patients with Major Depressive Disorder were "overwhelmingly positive," and was particularly impressed by the key efficacy endpoints evaluating both suicidality and depression comparing favorably relative to Street expectations, reaffirming the analyst's view of mechanistic differentiation of intranasal racemic ketamine, or SLS-002, relative to esketamine. The analyst views today's intraday weakness as a "sell-the-news" reaction, and sees institutional buying potentially driving the stock toward the firm's $15 price target.

While Ross capital, which the person who did the negative analysis is ranked 7110 out of 7513.

Can or how a analysis with such a horrible reputation have such a impact?

No real catalysts expected other than: they beat earnings, and haven't really had a good COVID recovery bump yet. Plus they have a decent dividend, and they're a real American company you can feel good about investing in. I think this is a good long term hold.

TORONTO, May 17, 2021 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Digihost Technology Inc. (‚Äú**Digihost**‚Äù or the ‚Äú**Company**‚Äù) (TSXV: DGHI; OTCQB: HSSHF) is pleased to report that over 90% of the energy consumed by the Company in its Bitcoin (‚Äú**BTC**‚Äù) mining operations is from sources that create zero carbon emissions and more than 50% of the energy consumed by the Company is generated from renewable resources.  


The following table provides a breakdown of the sources of energy consumed by Digihost in its BTC mining operations in 2020:

https://preview.redd.it/yvz85nzvnyz61.png?width=860&format=png&auto=webp&s=a9701f3f572d23940e3271369fa5a995d4b2f0ac

A cornerstone of Digihost‚Äôs business strategy is to continue to mine BTC in an efficient and environmentally conscious manner, thereby minimizing the Company‚Äôs carbon footprint. Digihost will assess a number of alternatives including the purchase of carbon credits to reduce its already low carbon footprint. The Company‚Äôs long-term plans for growth include vertical integration of power production from low-cost, clean and renewable sources of energy. On March 24, 2021, the Company announced the acquisition of a 60MW power plant for which it intends, to the extent possible, to source and utilize renewable natural gas and also engage in the practice of acquiring renewable energy certificates, all in line with the Company‚Äôs objective to reduce and mitigate its carbon footprint.

Michel Amar, the Company‚Äôs CEO, stated: ‚ÄúWe are extremely proud to report that over 90% of the energy consumed by Digihost is from sources producing zero carbon emissions, and that over 50% is from renewable sources of energy, making Digihost one of the cleanest green Bitcoin mining operations in the United States. As a Company, we have always been cognizant of the potential impact Bitcoin mining could have on the environment and therefore have planned our growth and expansion to be environmentally conscious, in our pursuit of opportunities that maximize value for our shareholders.‚Äù

[Source](https://finance.yahoo.com/news/digihost-reports-green-energy-consumption-114700287.html)

KYNC has been aggressively following the same path as ICBU did, with the same famed CEO Rick Wilson behind it. If you were here a few months ago, then you know about ICBU‚Äôs run from the 000‚Äôs to a peak at .0465 in the span of a couple months. 

KYNC has been slowly building, sitting at .0153 now, higher than ICBU was when it launched. This past Friday they finally got cleared for access with the OTC, and uploaded last years finances. Yesterday they uploaded first quarter financials. Today their OTC profile was posted as ‚Äúverified‚Äù. Rick makes things happen and moves fast. Attorney letter is expected any day, and pink current should happen quick. This one has been hyped for a bit, and is primed for a big run. Once pink current and the website is live, it‚Äôs on.

No one is exactly sure what Rick has in store for it, all we know is ‚ÄúBlockchain/NFT, Professional Sports, Entertainment, Contactless payment‚Äù. 

That‚Äôs from their Twitter header pic, which did have NBA logo on it recently, so you can see why there‚Äôs a lot of hype and speculation behind it.

The past two days have seen some consolidation from fridays run up with the news, but still held very strong from a sell off. 

I‚Äôve had a long position on this one awhile, and also have had a large position in another account I‚Äôve been day trading and flipping on the ride up the past two months. As of today I‚Äôm not risking flipping that account anymore. Holding because I feel any day it‚Äôs about to make the big run, and I‚Äôm not getting stuck chasing. 

Good luck, be smart, and don‚Äôt forget to take profits on the ride up.

I'm currently in the process of combing through all the data I collected on hot penny stocks for the last 9 months and trying to identify a pattern/edge to use on small caps. I know there exists patterns out there already by some top traders like Steven Dux and his gap up short, first green Day and dip buy etc.

Has anyone had any success in finding their own edge using statistics and tracking tonnes of Pennystock data? 

Right now one pattern I'm noticing is that pennystocks that break out early in the day and trade more than their float after the initial break out and first pullback will bounce off that breakout level but I'm still analysing each time this pattern has occured to find a win rate and risk/reward ratio etc.

A few months ago I got into this penny stock based off some DD I read on this sub. I bought around $1, it slowly went down and I sold around $0.66$. I kept an eye on it for a while as I continued to go down and I think it was in the $0.40's last I checked. 

I check today and it's at $1.50! And I want to know when the heck this happened. So I look and the graph and I see it was never that low. So what the heck happened? Am I losing it or is anyone else seeing this?

PTK - possible recovery around May 13

PLTR - possible recovery around May 13 as well

This could just be due to a rotation, however based on following the news it looks like it‚Äôs more of a reaction and change in sentiment.

NNOX might be on a recovery as well but it‚Äôs too early to tell.

This is NOT advice and all those stocks have a history of trading sideways but they‚Äôre probably worth adding to your watchlist at the very least.

They‚Äôre all stocks I‚Äôve done my own private DD on in the past which looked promising.

PLTR is probably recovering because they smashed earnings.

PTK is probably recovering because of their JV with Xiamen (not sure I spelled that right)

And NNOX is probably recovering due to some investor conferences which restored faith after some really nasty short reports just about wiped them out (muddy waters etc).

This is just a quick observation while I have time.

Please just take this as a tip but do your own research.

This is a follow up to my previous post about investing in Commodity stocks related to the DE-carbonization of the planet. To be perfectly clear, this is a list of companies I believe would give you some winning advantage going forward in investing in these related companies. This is not a complete list, but it could get you started. (I thought I posted this a couple months back but apparently it was just in the drafts folder.

Lithium producers. SQM , MALRF, ALB.  ERPNF

Lithium Development. CYDVF, LI, LIACF, LAC, SPMTF. (Ones I know... Search out more.)

Lithium Exploration - SNNAF, QMC.v, PE.v, SLL.v, BKPTF. (All Canadian companies. There are lots in all countries so look where you are...)

Cobalt Producers - S.to, FCX, LUN.to, KAT.to

Cobalt Development - EQN.to, FCO.to, CCO.to,

Cobalt Exploration - FCC.v, BKPTF, NMX.v, DM.to,

Nickle Producers - RTP, NILSY, S.to, FM.to,

Nickle Development - GMC.to, NI.to, ASN.v,

Nickle Exploration - HNC.to, DM.to, GSS.v, TLOFF (Note... Cobalt is found with Nickle and silver. Cobalt companies would go here too...)

Copper Producers - RIO, FCX, SCCO, FM.to, LUN.to

Copper Development - TRQ.to, SCCO, ERO.to. CMMC.to

Copper Exploration - SURG.v, APN.v, CN.v, WCC.v, OCO.v.

Neodymium - This one search rare earth companies. I don't know enough about these to post a breakdown of producer/developer/explorer but these companies are in the sector. - MP, NEO.to, LEM.v, UCU.v

Iron Producers - RIO, VALE, BHP, FSUGY,  NMDC

Iron Development - (Just kidding.... I don't know any companies exploring or developing for Iron... buy the producers...)

For transparency, I have shares in the following companies and have posted on most of them before. SPMT.cn/SPMTF, CYP.V/CYDVF, BKPTF/CRUZ.cse, SNNAF/SIE.v, S.to, ALB,  DM.to, RIO , LI, and PE.v.

For why I picked these ones to own, SPMTF just completed a drilling program and has a deposit, they are directly beside CYDVF who is beside ALB. CYDVF also has a deposit and ALB is the only producer of lithium in North America. So it is an area play. In the area as well is BKPTF, PE.v and SNNAF. PE.v is currently drilling lithium brine and the other two are directly beside them. If one hits they all hit and they are really cheap ATM. S.to and BKPTF have Cobalt and will run on that alone but both also have other resources that is not as obvious including Nickle, Silver and others. DM.to will move with nickle and RIO is a huge produces of several of these commodities. I think that covers it. Bar non, CRUZ/BKPTF is my easiest trade as I think it will double in a few weeks.

I know there are lots of companies I have not listed so add your picks with some DD to help others get some wins. Market is turning green so lets get some tendies... Just remember, while some of these are great short term plays several you want to hold long term. You job is to know the difference. I think they all will outperform the market over a few years...

In an effort to keep the "main sub" a little cleaner in regards to "low effort posts," this will be a catch all for the simple questions that get asked on a regular basis.

We want to help new investors/traders. That's definitely one of the main goals of this community. We don't want to run people off, but at the same time we want there to at least be some sort of standard to what constitutes "low effort." We wish to differentiate between legitimate, detailed questions predicated upon at least a base level of due dilligence and questions that may be better served going into an "other folder," so to speak.

Also to note, anything that fits the description of what goes in this thread will be deleted from the "main sub," so there may be a learning curve of people wondering why their posts are getting deleted. This new format sticky thread will be auto re-posted daily so as not to get too cluttered.

The following is a list of what is relegated to this "catch all" thread, and is subject to change based on the needs of the sub:

1. What broker should I use?
2. What do you guys think of "XXXX" stock?
3. Should I buy or sell "XXXX" stock?
4. Any threads with ZERO DD
5. Anything that would have gone into the "any stocks go here" sticky thread (cryprocurrency is still banned)
6. Any questions you think might be "stupid" questions
7. Any post requesting people's thoughts on your thoughts

Sienna announces Arctic Drilling AS of Norway will be conducting the drill program on the Bleka project.

The Bleka Project is located in an under explored green-stone belt in southern Norway with areas of historic gold production and well documented gold occurrences. The  Bleka Vein was discovered in 1880 and mined intermittently until 1940,  with historic production reported as 165 kilograms (i.e., \~ 5,300 troy  ounces) of gold sourced from mineralized material with an average grade  of **36 g/t** gold. The project covers the historic mining area and  swarms of similar veins that extend for at least three kilometres along  strike. To understand this specific area and this deposit it is good to know that it is an orogenic formation with a folded nose type of deposit. These are created when the the earth was forming and the plates were converging creating a subduction zone and an area that was being up-thrust and rolled in to a tight layered formation. This type of formation has been responsible for many of the significant deposits located around the world.

The company has a project deck to help explain this better than I can here. [https://www.siennaresources.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/SIE-Deck-Bleka-Vekselmyr-2020-1.pdf](https://www.siennaresources.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/SIE-Deck-Bleka-Vekselmyr-2020-1.pdf)

With this announcement Sienna will being their work program on this project within this month and should be able to provide updates as the work progresses. This an exciting, near surface project which should be very good for both the company and shareholders. All targets are shallow (Less than 100') and as you can see from the link, there are many to choose from in this area. I have been told there should be 6-7 holes on this program and if warranted, the company would expect to increase that number significantly once the results are know.

[https://ca.finance.yahoo.com/news/sienna-engages-arctic-drilling-norway-070100540.html](https://ca.finance.yahoo.com/news/sienna-engages-arctic-drilling-norway-070100540.html)

With the instability of other investments, this project and gold seems to be a good place to invest at this time.  I hope you find the information helpful. This is not investment advise. I've starting to notice the same trend happening each week. Monday and Tuesday's always seem to be neutral days where some stocks go up, some go down but relatively even across the board. Wednesday's and Thursdays seem to be completely red across the board with small to large dips. Friday everything seems to have a strong recovery into the weekend and then the cycle repeats the following week. 

Is there any reason for this? It's a little frustrating but I'm holding everything I have long so I look forward to getting some Thursday discounts on pay days. Just curious as to why it's following such a pattern

Company Posts 128% Increase in Revenue in Q1 of 2021 Compared to Q1 in 2020

Melbourne, Florida--(Newsfile Corp. - May 19, 2021) - ¬†Kona Gold Beverage, Inc. (OTCQB: KGKG), a holding company focused on product development in the better-for-you and hemp and CBD functional beverage sector, is pleased to announce net revenues through May of fiscal year 2021 has surpassed net revenues for the total fiscal year 2020. The Company recently posted its 10-Q with approximately $462,000 in net revenues, which is approximately a 129% increase from the same period quarter last year.

Kona Gold Beverage recently announced it anticipates second quarter revenues to be approximately $750,000, which it now anticipates to hit by mid-June. This would make Q2 the Company's largest quarterly revenues in the Company's history. Additional closings of additional partnerships that the Company is currently working on could push Q2 revenues close to $1 million, which would be a huge milestone for the Company. The Company anticipates a gross profit of approximately 30% from these revenues.

"I am excited to share with our stock holders the phenomenal growth we are experiencing in 2021, which has been fueled by the acquisition of our lemonade brand, Ooh La Lemin in early 2021," stated Robert Clark, CEO of Kona Gold Beverage, Inc. "Since the inception of Kona Gold Beverage, our goal has been to create products that resonate with consumers on a national scale, and we are executing on that goal. Our focus is to continue expanding, grow market share, and make our beverage portfolio available to everyone at their local retailer across the U.S. Our strategy will not only continue to increase bottom line revenue, but also shareholder value."

Kona Gold Beverage recently received its largest purchase order to date. The purchase order, which came in from a new vendor, and was for the Company's Ooh La Lemin Lemonade, was approximately $250,000. The new vendor, which has over 300 stores across 15 states in the Midwestern united states, will receive half a pallet of Ooh La Lemin Lemonade for each store. The Company is working to fulfill this order in the next couple of weeks.

New rules will affect your ability to buy and sell ‚ÄúPink No Information‚Äù securities, including at E*TRADE 

On September 28, 2021, new requirements take effect that will impact the market for‚Äîand value of‚Äîcertain ‚Äúover-the-counter (OTC) securities‚Äù you currently hold or have held in the past. The new rules apply to ‚ÄúPink No Information‚Äù OTC securities of companies that fail to publicly report and keep current financial and other company information and will restrict the ability of U.S. brokers, like E*TRADE from making these products generally available. 

Some background on the new requirements 

The Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) recently adopted amendments to SEC Rule 15c2-11 governing the submission and publication of OTC quotations. These amendments will prohibit broker-dealers from submitting or publicly disseminating bid/ask quotations for OTC securities of issuers that do not meet enhanced information filing requirements. 

Securities of issuers that make the required information publicly available by the deadline in the rule should not be affected. 

What these changes mean for you 

Starting September 28, 2021, you will no longer be able to buy or sell ‚ÄúPink No Information‚Äù OTC securities through E*TRADE. Other restrictions related to the purchase of these securities may apply sooner. Please keep in mind that the upcoming changes will negatively affect the value of any ‚ÄúPink No Information‚Äù OTC securities you hold now or in the future. 

Have you guys seen this for those who buy OTC on E*TRADE? What do I do with my pennies on E*TRADE?

I‚Äôve been going through news about PPE & publicly traded PPE companies like DuPont (DD), 3M (MMM), Owens & Minor (OMI), and Optec but I did some research on $OPTI.

Current Value(11:30am today) $.061
